content.en: Polymerization simulation: Scientists have been using algorithms to study the effects of different variables on polymerization processes. These algorithms are able to simulate the kinetics, molecular weight distribution, and microstructure of polymers formed in these processes. By using Monte Carlo methods and other modeling techniques, researchers can gain insights into the behavior of polymerization reactions and make predictions about their outcomes.
content.da: Polymerisationssimulering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at studere virkningen af forskellige variable på polymerisationsprocesser. Disse algoritmer er i stand til at simulere kinetikken, molekylvægtsfordelingen og mikrostrukturen af polymerer dannet i disse processer. Ved brug af Monte Carlo-metoder og andre modelleringsteknikker kan forskere opnå indsigt i polymerisationsreaktioners adfærd og forudsige deres resultater.
